LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsScaledSpawnTimeButto: Scale spawn time to pawn combat power
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsFixedSpawnTimeButton: Fix spawn time to certain amount
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsScaledSpawnTimePoint: Scaled spawn interval points per second
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsFixedSpawnTimeSecond: Fixed spawn interval seconds per spawn
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsCachePawns: Cache spawned pawns for each spawner until chosen pawn kind changes
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsUseAllyFaction: Assign spawned pawns to a custom ally faction instead of the player faction
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsDisableCorpses: Disable spawned pawn corpses and dropped items
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsSpawnOnThreats: Spawn pawns only when threats are detected
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsCrossMap: Spawn pawns near threats on different maps
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsGroupSpawns: Group pawns of the same kind together
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsDoNotDamagePlayerBui: Spawned pawns do not damage player buildings
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsMassivelyDamageEnemy: Spawned pawns deal massive damage to enemy buildings
LanguageData.RimSpawners_PawnSelectionDesc: Select the type of creature to spawn
LanguageData.RimSpawners_DropPodToggleDesc: Use drop pods to deliver creatures
LanguageData.RimSpawners_DropSpotSelectDesc: Select a location where drop pods should be centered on
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SpawnAllAtOnceDesc: Burst fabricate creatures until the control point limit is reached. The time necessary to cool down will increase accordingly.
LanguageData.RimSpawners_VanometricFabricatorInspectC: Chosen to fabricate {0}. Current creatures are using {1}/{2} control points.
LanguageData.RimSpawners_VanometricFabricatorInspectL: Chosen to fabricate {0}. Current creatures are using up all {1} control points. Fabrication is paused until control points are available.
LanguageData.RimSpawners_VanometricFabricatorInspectD: \nAssembler is dormant until a threat is detected.
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SpawnerManagerInspectString:
Points {0}/{1}. +{2} points per second.
Controlling {3} creatures using up {4} points.
{5} seconds until next fabrication round.
Fabrication queue: {6}.
{7}
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SpawnerManagerUpdateDesc: Force an early update of spawner points and spawn locations
